thread.title: Will ‘Margaritaville’ on Broadway Prove to Be Worth Its Salt?

author: Charles Passy
title: Will ‘Margaritaville’ on Broadway Prove to Be Worth Its Salt?
text:
There aren’t many Broadway musicals that all but encourage the audience to sing along with the cast. Or to mimic the movement of a shark, for that matter.
Suffice it to say, “Escape to Margaritaville” isn’t your typical musical.
Instead, it is an attempt by Jimmy Buffett and a group of veteran theater and film producers to take the singer-songwriter’s...
